{"id":555051191,"lang":"cpp","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1631663664,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/555051191/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"15.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& h) {\n        int l=0,r=h.size()-1,ans=0,lmx=0,rmx=0;\n        while(l<=r){\n            if(h[l]<=h[r]){\n                if(h[l]<lmx)ans+=lmx-h[l];\n                else lmx=h[l];\n                l++;\n            }\n            else{\n               if(h[r]<rmx)ans+=rmx-h[r];\n                else rmx=h[r];\n                r--; \n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
